Beaverton.Beaverton Foursquare Church:
The Beaverton Foursquare Church is a Foursquare Pentecostal church located in Beaverton, Oregon, United States. Currently worship services at Beaverton Foursquare draw approximately 5,000 people weekly.


== History ==
Beaverton Foursquare Church was founded by Bill Melton and his wife, Jean, in 1961.
